title_cn: 有潜力的陷阱

title_cn: 天然玻璃状晶体

title_cn: 新型电灯开关

title_cn: 然后有三个

title: Voltage-controlled domain wall traps in ferromagnetic nanowires
title_cn: 铁磁纳米线中的压控畴壁陷阱
abstract: Electrical control of magnetism has the potential to bring about revolutionary new spintronic devices, many of which rely on efficient manipulation of magnetic domain walls in ferromagnetic nanowires. Recently, it has been shown that voltage-induced charge accumulation at a metal–oxide interface can influence domain wall motion in ultrathin metallic ferromagnets, but the effects have been relatively modest and limited to the slow, thermally activated regime. Here we show that a voltage can generate non-volatile switching of magnetic properties at the nanoscale by modulating interfacial chemistry rather than charge density. Using a solid-state ionic conductor as a gate dielectric, we generate unprecedentedly strong voltage-controlled domain wall traps that function as non-volatile, electrically programmable and switchable pinning sites. Pinning strengths of at least 650 Oe can be readily achieved, enough to bring to a standstill domain walls travelling at speeds of at least ∼20 m s−1. We exploit this new magneto-ionic effect to demonstrate a prototype non-volatile memory device in which voltage-controlled domain wall traps facilitate electrical bit selection in a magnetic nanowire register.
abstract_cn: 磁性的电势控制有可能带来革命性的新型自旋电子器件，其中许多依赖于对铁磁纳米线中磁畴壁的有效操纵。近来，已经表明电压诱导的在金属氧化物界面上的电荷积聚可以影响超薄金属铁磁体中的畴壁运动，但是这种作用相对适度，并且限于缓慢的热激活机制。在这里，我们表明电压可以通过调节界面化学而不是电荷密度来在纳米级产生磁性的非易失性切换。使用固态离子导体作为栅极电介质，我们生成了空前强大的压控畴壁陷阱，这些陷阱用作非易失性，电可编程和可切换的钉扎点。至少可以轻松获得至少650 Oe的钉扎强度，足以使停滞的畴壁以至少＆＃8764; 20 m s ＆＃8722; 1 的速度行进。我们利用这种新的磁离子效应来演示一种非易失性存储设备原型，其中电压控制的畴壁陷阱有助于磁性纳米线寄存器中的电位选择。

title: Gigahertz quantized charge pumping in graphene quantum dots
title_cn: 石墨烯量子点中的千兆赫兹量化电荷泵浦
abstract: Single-electron pumps are set to revolutionize electrical metrology by enabling the ampere to be redefined in terms of the elementary charge of an electron. Pumps based on lithographically fixed tunnel barriers in mesoscopic metallic systems and normal/superconducting hybrid turnstiles can reach very small error rates, but only at megahertz pumping speeds that correspond to small currents of the order of picoamperes. Tunable barrier pumps in semiconductor structures are operated at gigahertz frequencies, but the theoretical treatment of the error rate is more complex and only approximate predictions are available. Here, we present a monolithic, fixed-barrier single-electron pump made entirely from graphene that performs at frequencies up to several gigahertz. Combined with the record-high accuracy of the quantum Hall effect and proximity-induced Josephson junctions, quantized-current generation brings an all-graphene closure of the quantum metrological triangle within reach. Envisaged applications for graphene charge pumps outside quantum metrology include single-photon generation via electron–hole recombination in electrostatically doped bilayer graphene reservoirs, single Dirac fermion emission in relativistic electron quantum optics and read-out of spin-based graphene qubits in quantum information processing.
abstract_cn: 通过使安培数可以根据电子的基本电荷重新定义，单电子泵被设置为彻底改变电计量学。基于介观金属系统中的光刻固定隧道势垒和正常/超导混合旋转栅的泵，可以达到非常小的错误率，但是仅在兆赫兹的抽速下才对应于皮安级的小电流。半导体结构中的可调谐势垒泵以千兆赫兹频率运行，但是错误率的理论处理更为复杂，仅提供近似预测。在这里，我们介绍了一种完全由石墨烯制成的单片固定势垒单电子泵，其频率高达几千兆赫。结合量子霍尔效应和接近感应的约瑟夫森结的创纪录的高精确度，量化电流的产生将量子计量三角形的全石墨烯封闭带到了可触及的范围内。量子计量学以外的石墨烯电荷泵的预期应用包括在静电掺杂的双层石墨烯储库中通过电子空穴重组产生单光子，相对论电子量子光学中的单狄拉克费米子发射以及量子信息中基于自旋的石墨烯量子位的读出处理。</ p>

title: A transparent electrode based on a metal nanotrough network
title_cn: 基于金属纳米槽网络的透明电极
abstract: Transparent conducting electrodes are essential components for numerous flexible optoelectronic devices, including touch screens and interactive electronics. Thin films of indium tin oxide—the prototypical transparent electrode material—demonstrate excellent electronic performances, but film brittleness, low infrared transmittance and low abundance limit suitability for certain industrial applications. Alternatives to indium tin oxide have recently been reported and include conducting polymers, carbon nanotubes and graphene. However, although flexibility is greatly improved, the optoelectronic performance of these carbon-based materials is limited by low conductivity. Other examples include metal nanowire-based electrodes, which can achieve sheet resistances of less than 10Ω □−1 at 90% transmission because of the high conductivity of the metals. To achieve these performances, however, metal nanowires must be defect-free, have conductivities close to their values in bulk, be as long as possible to minimize the number of wire-to-wire junctions, and exhibit small junction resistance. Here, we present a facile fabrication process that allows us to satisfy all these requirements and fabricate a new kind of transparent conducting electrode that exhibits both superior optoelectronic performances (sheet resistance of ∼2Ω □−1 at 90% transmission) and remarkable mechanical flexibility under both stretching and bending stresses. The electrode is composed of a free-standing metallic nanotrough network and is produced with a process involving electrospinning and metal deposition. We demonstrate the practical suitability of our transparent conducting electrode by fabricating a flexible touch-screen device and a transparent conducting tape.
abstract_cn: 透明导电电极是众多柔性光电设备（包括触摸屏和交互式电子设备）的基本组件。氧化铟锡薄膜，典型的透明电极材料具有出色的电子性能，但薄膜脆性，低红外透射率和低丰度限制了其对某些工业应用的适用性。最近已经报道了铟锡氧化物的替代物，包括导电聚合物，碳纳米管和石墨烯。然而，尽管极大地改善了柔性，但是这些碳基材料的光电性能受到低电导率的限制。其他示例包括基于金属纳米线的电极，由于其高电导率，该电极在90％的透射率下可实现小于10＆＃937;＆＃160;＆＃9633; ＆＃8722; 1 的薄层电阻金属。然而，为了实现这些性能，金属纳米线必须无缺陷，电导率接近其整体值，应尽可能长，以最大程度地减少线对线结的数量，并表现出较小的结电阻。在这里，我们提出了一种简便的制造工艺，该工艺使我们能够满足所有这些要求，并制造出一种新型的透明导电电极，该电极同时具有优异的光电性能（薄层电阻为＆＃8764; 2＆＃937;＆＃9633; ＆＃8722; 1 在90％的透射率下）以及在拉伸和弯曲应力下均具有出色的机械柔韧性。电极由独立的金属纳米槽网络组成，并通过涉及静电纺丝和金属沉积的工艺生产。通过制造柔性触摸屏设备和透明导电胶带，我们证明了透明导电电极的实用性。

title: A general and robust strategy for the synthesis of nearly monodisperse colloidal nanocrystals
title_cn: 合成几乎单分散的胶体纳米晶体的通用且稳健的策略
abstract: Colloidal nanocrystals exhibit a wide range of size- and shape-dependent properties and have found application in myriad fields, incuding optics, electronics, mechanics, drug delivery and catalysis, to name but a few. Synthetic protocols that enable the simple and convenient production of colloidal nanocrystals with controlled size, shape and composition are therefore of key general importance. Current strategies include organic solution-phase synthesis, thermolysis of organometallic precursors, sol–gel processes, hydrothermal reactions and biomimetic and dendrimer templating. Often, however, these procedures require stringent experimental conditions, are difficult to generalize, or necessitate tedious multistep reactions and purification. Recently, linear amphiphilic block co-polymer micelles have been used as templates to synthesize functional nanocrystals, but the thermodynamic instability of these micelles limits the scope of this approach. Here, we report a general strategy for crafting a large variety of functional nanocrystals with precisely controlled dimensions, compositions and architectures by using star-like block co-polymers as nanoreactors. This new class of co-polymers forms unimolecular micelles that are structurally stable, therefore overcoming the intrinsic instability of linear block co-polymer micelles. Our approach enables the facile synthesis of organic solvent- and water-soluble nearly monodisperse nanocrystals with desired composition and architecture, including core–shell and hollow nanostructures. We demonstrate the generality of our approach by describing, as examples, the synthesis of various sizes and architectures of metallic, ferroelectric, magnetic, semiconductor and luminescent colloidal nanocrystals.
abstract_cn: 胶体纳米晶体表现出各种尺寸和形状相关的特性，并已在无数领域中得到应用，包括光学，电子，机械，药物输送和催化等。因此，能够简单，方便地生产具有受控大小，形状和组成的胶体纳米晶体的合成方案具有关键的普遍重要性。当前的策略包括有机溶液相合成，有机金属前体的热解，溶胶凝胶工艺，水热反应以及仿生和树枝状聚合物的模板化。但是，这些程序通常需要严格的实验条件，难以一概而论，或需要繁琐的多步反应和纯化。近来，线性两亲嵌段共聚物胶束已经用作模板来合成功能纳米晶体，但是这些胶束的热力学不稳定性限制了该方法的范围。在这里，我们报告了通过使用星形嵌段共聚物作为纳米反应器来制备具有精确控制的尺寸，组成和结构的各种功能纳米晶体的一般策略。这类新的共聚物形成结构稳定的单分子胶束，因此克服了线性嵌段共聚物胶束的固有不稳定性。我们的方法能够轻松合成具有所需组成和结构（包括核壳和中空纳米结构）的有机溶剂和水溶性几乎单分散的纳米晶体。通过举例说明金属，铁电，磁性，半导体和发光胶体纳米晶体的各种尺寸和结构的合成，我们证明了该方法的普遍性。</ p>

title: Long-distance coherent coupling in a quantum dot array
title_cn: 量子点阵列中的长距离相干耦合
abstract: Controlling long-distance quantum correlations is central to quantum computation and simulation. In quantum dot arrays, experiments so far rely on nearest-neighbour couplings only, and inducing long-distance correlations requires sequential local operations. Here, we show that two distant sites can be tunnel-coupled directly. The coupling is mediated by virtual occupation of an intermediate site, with a strength that is controlled via the energy detuning of this site. It permits a single charge to oscillate coherently between the outer sites of a triple dot array without passing through the middle, as demonstrated through the observation of Landau–Zener–Stückelberg interference. The long-distance coupling significantly improves the prospects of fault-tolerant quantum computation using quantum dot arrays, and opens up new avenues for performing quantum simulations in nanoscale devices.
abstract_cn: 控制长距离量子相关性对量子计算和仿真至关重要。 在量子点阵列中，到目前为止，实验仅依赖于最近邻居，而诱导长距离相关则需要顺序进行局部运算。 在这里，我们显示了两个遥远的站点可以直接通过隧道耦合。 耦合是通过中间站点的虚拟占用来实现的，其强度是通过该站点的能量失谐控制的。 通过观察Landau，Zener，Stckelberg干扰可以看出，它允许单电荷在三点阵列的外部位置之间相干振荡，而不会穿过中间。 长距离耦合极大地改善了使用量子点阵列的容错量子计算的前景，并为在纳米级器件中进行量子模拟开辟了新的途径。

title: Exchange bias of the interface spin system at the Fe/MgO interface
title_cn: Fe / MgO界面上的界面自旋系统的交换偏压
abstract: The ferromagnet/oxide interface is key to developing emerging multiferroic and spintronic technologies with new functionality. Here we probe the Fe/MgO interface magnetization, and identify a new exchange bias phenomenon manifested only in the interface spin system, and not in the bulk. The interface magnetization exhibits a pronounced exchange bias, and the hysteresis loop is shifted entirely to one side of the zero field axis. However, the bulk magnetization does not, in marked contrast to typical systems where exchange bias is manifested in the net magnetization. This reveals the existence of an antiferromagnetic exchange pinning layer at the interface, identified here as FeO patches that exist even for a nominally ‘clean’ interface. These results demonstrate that atomic moments at the interface are non-collinear with the bulk magnetization, and therefore may affect the net anisotropy or serve as spin scattering sites. We control the exchange bias magnitude by varying the interface oxygen concentration and Fe–O bonding.
abstract_cn: 铁磁体/氧化物接口是开发具有新功能的新兴多铁和自旋电子技术的关键。在这里，我们探究了Fe / MgO界面的磁化强度，并确定了仅在界面自旋系统中而不是整体中出现的新的交换偏置现象。界面磁化表现出明显的交换偏压，并且磁滞回线完全移至零磁场轴的一侧。然而，与在净磁化强度中表现出交换偏压的典型系统形成鲜明对比的是，体磁化强度没有。这揭示了在界面处存在反铁磁交换钉扎层，此处将其标识为甚至在名义上“清洁”也存在的FeO斑块。接口。这些结果表明，界面处的原子矩与体磁化强度不是共线的，因此可能影响净各向异性或用作自旋散射位点。我们通过改变界面氧浓度和Fe＆＃8211O键来控制交换偏压的大小。

title: Glass-like phonon scattering from a spontaneous nanostructure in AgSbTe2
title_cn: AgSbTe2中自发纳米结构的玻璃状声子散射
abstract: Materials with very low thermal conductivity are of great interest for both thermoelectric and optical phase-change applications. Synthetic nanostructuring is most promising for suppressing thermal conductivity through phonon scattering, but challenges remain in producing bulk samples. In crystalline AgSbTe2 we show that a spontaneously forming nanostructure leads to a suppression of thermal conductivity to a glass-like level. Our mapping of the phonon mean free paths provides a novel bottom-up microscopic account of thermal conductivity and also reveals intrinsic anisotropies associated with the nanostructure. Ground-state degeneracy in AgSbTe2 leads to the natural formation of nanoscale domains with different orderings on the cation sublattice, and correlated atomic displacements, which efficiently scatter phonons. This mechanism is general and suggests a new avenue for the nanoscale engineering of materials to achieve low thermal conductivities for efficient thermoelectric converters and phase-change memory devices.
abstract_cn: 对于热电和光学相变应用，具有非常低的导热率的材料非常受关注。合成纳米结构最有希望通过声子散射抑制热导率，但是在生产大量样品方面仍然存在挑战。在结晶的AgSbTe 2 中，我们显示出自发形成的纳米结构可将热导率抑制到玻璃状水平。我们对声子平均自由程的映射提供了一种新颖的自下而上的微观导热系数的解释，还揭示了与纳米结构相关的固有各向异性。 AgSbTe 2 的基态简并性导致阳离子亚晶格上自然形成具有不同顺序的纳米级结构域，以及相关的原子位移，从而有效地散射了声子。这种机制是普遍的，并为材料的纳米级工程化提供了一条新途径，以实现低热导率，从而实现高效的热电转换器和相变存储器件。

title: DNA sequencing using electrical conductance measurements of a DNA polymerase
title_cn: 使用DNA聚合酶的电导测量进行DNA测序
abstract: The development of personalized medicine—in which medical treatment is customized to an individual on the basis of genetic information—requires techniques that can sequence DNA quickly and cheaply. Single-molecule sequencing technologies, such as nanopores, can potentially be used to sequence long strands of DNA without labels or amplification, but a viable technique has yet to be established. Here, we show that single DNA molecules can be sequenced by monitoring the electrical conductance of a phi29 DNA polymerase as it incorporates unlabelled nucleotides into a template strand of DNA. The conductance of the polymerase is measured by attaching it to a protein transistor that consists of an antibody molecule (immunoglobulin G) bound to two gold nanoparticles, which are in turn connected to source and drain electrodes. The electrical conductance of the DNA polymerase exhibits well-separated plateaux that are ∼3 pA in height. Each plateau corresponds to an individual base and is formed at a rate of ∼22 nucleotides per second. Additional spikes appear on top of the plateaux and can be used to discriminate between the four different nucleotides. We also show that the sequencing platform works with a variety of DNA polymerases and can sequence difficult templates such as homopolymers.
abstract_cn: 个性化医学的发展，其中基于遗传信息为个体量身定制医疗，需要能够快速而廉价地测序DNA的技术。单分子测序技术（例如纳米孔）可以潜在地用于对长链DNA进行测序，而无需标记或扩增，但是尚未确立可行的技术。在这里，我们显示可以通过监测phi29 DNA聚合酶的电导来对单个DNA分子进行测序，因为它将未标记的核苷酸掺入了DNA的模板链中。聚合酶的电导率是通过将其连接到蛋白质晶体管上来测量的，该蛋白质晶体管由结合到两个金纳米颗粒上的抗体分子（免疫球蛋白G）组成，而金纳米颗粒又连接到源电极和漏电极。 DNA聚合酶的电导率显示出高度分离的平台，平台高度为＆＃8764; 3 pA。每个平台对应一个单独的碱基，并以每秒22个核苷酸的速率形成。额外的尖峰出现在平台峰的顶部，可用于区分四个不同的核苷酸。我们还证明了该测序平台可与多种DNA聚合酶一起使用，并可对困难的模板（如均聚物）进行测序。

title: Two DNA nanomachines map pH changes along intersecting endocytic pathways inside the same cell
title_cn: 两个DNA纳米机器沿着同一细胞内相交的内吞途径绘制pH变化图
abstract: DNA is a versatile scaffold for molecular sensing in living cells, and various cellular applications of DNA nanodevices have been demonstrated. However, the simultaneous use of different DNA nanodevices within the same living cell remains a challenge. Here, we show that two distinct DNA nanomachines can be used simultaneously to map pH gradients along two different but intersecting cellular entry pathways. The two nanomachines, which are molecularly programmed to enter cells via different pathways, can map pH changes within well-defined subcellular environments along both pathways inside the same cell. We applied these nanomachines to probe the pH of early endosomes and the trans-Golgi network, in real time. When delivered either sequentially or simultaneously, both nanomachines localized into and independently captured the pH of the organelles for which they were designed. The successful functioning of DNA nanodevices within living systems has important implications for sensing and therapies in a diverse range of contexts.
abstract_cn: DNA是在活细胞中进行分子传感的通用支架，并且已经证明了DNA纳米器件在细胞中的各种应用。然而，在同一活细胞内同时使用不同的DNA纳米装置仍然是一个挑战。在这里，我们表明两个不同的DNA纳米机可以同时用于沿着两个不同但相交的细胞进入途径绘制pH梯度。这两个纳米机器经过分子编程，可以通过不同的途径进入细胞，它们可以沿着同一细胞内部的两个途径，在明确定义的亚细胞环境中绘制pH值变化图。我们将这些纳米机器应用于实时探测早期内体的pH值和反高尔基网络。当顺序或同时递送时，两个纳米机器都位于并独立捕获为其设计的细胞器的pH。 DNA纳米设备在生命系统中的成功运行对于在各种情况下的传感和治疗具有重要意义。</ p>
